instruction: Rewrite the given poem in a more modern style.
input:
An old Scottish blessing

May the cat nap at your feet 
And the devil, distant keep. 
May God fill your heart with cheer 
All throughout the New Year.
output:
A modern Scottish blessing

May your cat purr at your feet 
And a devilish thought never cross your mind. 
May your heart be filled with joy and cheer 
In the coming years.
